headline: 3 Beaten-Down Tech Stocks to Buy That Have Raised Their Dividends for 15 Years in a Row
summary: Microsoft (NASDAQ: MSFT), Apple, and Nvidia.  It has crushed the S&P 500 over the long term, gaining 342% over the last decade compared to 145% for the index.  The technology sector has grown in value by so much that it now makes up 29.6% of the S&P 500.

headline: Could software act as a surprise safe haven in the tariff wars?
summary: Investing.com -- The latest wave of U.S. tariffs rattled markets, hitting software stocks with declines ranging from low single digits to more than 10% in smaller-cap names. But according to Bernstein, the reaction may be more panic than substance.

headline: Dividend Champion, Contender, And Challenger Highlights: Week Of April 6
summary: Dividend Champions is a compilation of companies that consistently increased annual dividend payouts. Check out recent and upcoming dividend related activity.
